**On what platforms do you need an account?**

AWS is our standard Cloud platform. If selecting Azure or GCP, please provide reason.




- [ ] AWS
- [ ] Azure
- [ ] GCP
- [ ] Slack
- [ ] Trello
- [ ] Zoom
